mapper.select: SELECT c.name FROM city c INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE p.name = #{province}
SELECT a.name FROM area a INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id WHERE c.name = #{city}
SELECT id FROM area WHERE name = #{area}
SELECT h.name FROM housing_estate h INNER JOIN area a ON h.area_id = a.id AND a.name = #{area}

SELECT h.name as housingEstate, a.name as area, c.name as city, p.name as province FROM ((housing_estate h INNER JOIN area a ON h.area_id = a.id) INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id) INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE h.id = #{housingEstateId}
SELECT a.name as area, c.name as city, p.name as province FROM (area a INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id) INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE a.id = #{areaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO housing_estate (name, area_id) VALUE (#{name}, #{areaId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM housing_estate WHERE name = #{name} AND area_id = #{areaId}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM housing_estate WHERE name = #{name} AND area_id = #{areaId}
